title: Mars in Aquarius
summary: Drive is inventive, principled, and group-oriented. Action favors collaboration, technology, and unconventional methods. The opportunity is to direct innovation toward shared goals while staying attuned to people.

meaning.headline: Energy wants to disrupt, improve systems, and act with ideals in mind.

frames.text: Mars in Aquarius energizes teamwork, activism, and experimenting with new approaches.
Detachment can help focus on strategy over ego.
Group efforts and networks can amplify impact.
Technical or analytical tasks benefit from extra drive.
Being contrarian for its own sake equals progress.

frictions: Scattering effort across too many causes

do: Explain the why behind innovative moves.
Check how changes affect people, not just systems.
Prioritize one experiment at a time.
avoid: Changing things only to be different
Skipping consent in the name of efficiency

reusable_lines.text: Innovate with people in mind, not just the idea.
One good experiment beats ten half-starts.

forbidden_claims: Guarantees of social or technological success
allowed_framing: Supportive framing: can energize collaborative, innovative action
Agency-forward language: you choose which changes to pursue
Contextual framing: objectivity helps when paired with empathy

sources: Mars as drive/assertion archetype in daily cycles
